meta.name: 3 Idiots
meta.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

review.name: Very good movie!
review.reviewBody:
This is the very first time i write a review, mostly because I'm very lazy.

However I just watched this film and i gotta admit it...

I loved it!!!!

At first i was like well "lets see what this movie has to offer"

(btw its also the first Indian movie I've ever seen) and I was like okay

its funny and then... like wow so thoughtful and reflexive! It really

made me meditate about my career and my real dreams! Its a very good

movie! I'll recommend it to all my friends!

You must watch it!

All is Well!

meta.keywords: motivation,coming of age,against the system,hairy chest,papadum

trailer.name: 3 Idiots trailer
trailer.description: 3 Idiots is a movie starring Aamir Khan, Madhavan, and Mona Singh. Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

description.value: 3 Idiots is a movie starring Aamir Khan, Madhavan, and Mona Singh. Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name.value: The Rise of Ali Fazal: From '3 Idiots' to "Mirzapur"

description.value: Ali Fazal, best known for his roles in Hindi films like '3 Idiots' and 'Fukrey' as well as international films like 'Furious 7' and 'Victoria & Abdul', returns as hot-headed gangster Guddu Pandit in season two of the Amazon Prime Video series "Mirzapur." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his versatile acting career.

plotText.plainText: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

text.plaidHtml: Shah Rukh Khan who declined this film to work on "My Name Is Khan" (2010) referred himself as the 4th idiot, who declined to work in such a great movie.
During the baby delivery scenes, supposedly taking place around 2003, both parties engaged in the video chat use Google Chrome web browser which was not released until 2008.

lines.text: Sir, I forgot to take something...

Instruments that record, analyse, summarise, organise, debate and explain information; that are illustrated, non-illustrated, hardbound, paperback, jacketed, non-jacketed; with foreword, introduction, table of contents, index; that are indented for the enlightenment, understanding, enrichment, enhancement and education of the human brain through sensory route of vision - sometimes touch.
What are you trying to say?
Books sir! I forgot to take my books.

text.plaidHtml: The theatrical release was rated U/A after the applicant replaced three words: Upper caste, Achhut (untouchable) and doctor with Badshah (king), Ghulam (slave) and Jyotish (astrologer) respectively.
